info.name: monochrome butterfly - home button
info.description: a butterfly to replace the tumblr home icon example: 1/2/3
info.additionalInfo: i was searching for a butterfly that i could use for my karneval theme and was satisfied with this one. i just figured i'd put it up as an individual style in case someone wanted to use it ^^ looks best on a light background/a layout that's also monochrome imo
